item.title: Caro add a quote by Susan Elizabeth Phillips
item.description: "There's nothing sexier in a man than intelligence." -- Susan Elizabeth Phillips

item.title: Caro add a quote by Brenda Jackson
item.description: "Why would a man need both a wife and a mistress? A smart man would seek out and fall in love with a woman who can play both." -- Brenda Jackson

item.title: Caro add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "Never trust a man who can dance." -- E.L. James

item.title: Caro add a quote by Claudia Gray
item.description: "Forget normal.” He grinned. “We’re going to be extraordinary." -- Claudia Gray

item.title: Caro add a quote by Claudia Gray
item.description: "I’ll never die", he said. Before I could protest, Lucas put two fingers on my lips, his smile seemed to fill the room with lights and I realized he was telling a deeper kind of truth then I’d ever known before “You’ll live forever and being remembered by you is the only immortality I’ll ever need if I only live on as a part of you – Bianca, that’s my idea of heaven" -- Claudia Gray

item.title: Caro add a quote by Jimi Hendrix
item.description: "I'm the one that's got to die when it's time for me to die, so let me live my life the way I want to." -- Jimi Hendrix

item.title: Caro add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "A lady's imagination is very rapid; it jumps from admiration to love, from love to matrimony in a moment." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Caro add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The more I know of the world, the more I am convinced that I shall never see a man whom I can really love. I require so much!" -- Jane Austen

item.title: Caro add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "He is a gentleman, and I am a gentleman's daughter. So far we are equal." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Caro add a quote by Susan Elizabeth Phillips
item.description: "The door closed behind her (Phoebe), and the two men regarded each other for a moment. Viktor spoke first. "I must have your promise, Coach, that you won't hurt her." Dan: "I won't." Viktor: "You spoke a little too quickly for my taste. I don't quite believe you." Dan: "I'm a man of my word, and I promise I won't hurt her." He flexed his hands. "When I murder her, I'll do it real quick so she won't feel a thing." Viktor sighed. "That's exactly what I was afraid of." -- Susan Elizabeth Phillips

item.title: Caro add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "I am going to have coffee with Christian Grey... and I hate coffee." -- E.L. James

item.title: Caro add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "You wanted hearts and flowers,” he murmurs. I blink at him, not quite believing what I’m seeing. “You have my heart.” And he waves toward the room. “And here are the flowers,” I whisper, completing his sentence. “Christian, it’s lovely." -- E.L. James

item.title: Caro add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "You love me,” I whisper. His eyes widen further and his mouth opens. He takes a huge breath as if winded. He looks tortured—vulnerable. “Yes,” he whispers. “I do." -- E.L. James

item.title: Caro add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "The elevator doors open on the ground floor. Christian shakes his head slightly as if to clear his thoughts and gestures for me to exit before him in a most gentlemanly manner. Who’s he kidding? He’s no gentleman. He has my panties." -- E.L. James

item.title: Caro add a quote by Madonna
item.description: "I'm tough, I'm ambitious, and I know exactly what I want. If that makes me a bitch, okay." -- Madonna

item.title: Caro add a quote by Simone de Beauvoir
item.description: "I am too intelligent, too demanding, and too resourceful for anyone to be able to take charge of me entirely. No one knows me or loves me completely. I have only myself" -- Simone de Beauvoir

item.title: Caro add a quote by Laura Whitcomb
item.description: "Someone was looking at me, a disturbing sensation if you're dead." -- Laura Whitcomb

item.title: Caro add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "I want your world to begin and end with me." -- E.L. James

item.title: Caro add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "My world was ordered, calm, and controlled, then you came into my life with your smart mouth, your innocence, your beauty, and your quiet temerity ...and everything before you was just dull, empty, mediocre ...it was nothing." -- E.L. James

item.title: Caro add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "And now my past and my future are colliding in a way I never thought possible." -- E.L. James

item.title: Caro add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "Anatasia You Are My More My Love, My Life Christian" -- E.L. James

item.title: Caro add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "What is a friend? A single soul dwelling in two bodies." -- Aristotle

item.title: Caro add a quote by Daniel Glattauer
item.description: "Schreiben Sie mir, Emmi. Schreiben ist wie küssen, nur ohne Lippen. Schreiben ist küssen mit dem Kopf." -- Daniel Glattauer

item.title: Caro add a quote by Fannie Flagg
item.description: "Remember if people talk behind your back, it only means you are two steps ahead." -- Fannie Flagg
